dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5544 IH: Upholding the Power of the Purse Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Mace introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend title 31, United States Code, to eliminate exceptions to the provisions of such title commonly referred to as the Miscellaneous Receipts Act, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Upholding the Power of the Purse Act.

section.header: Elimination of exceptions to Miscellaneous Receipts Act

subsection.text: Section 3302 of title 31, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subsection (a) by striking Except as provided by another law and inserting Except as provided in subsection (c)(3); and
in subsection (c), by add at the end the following:

The requirement in subsection (b) shall not apply to any Federal program under which the Government is a custodian of money for States or units of local government, or under which the Government disperses amounts to States or units of local government.

subsection.text: The amendments made by subsection (a) shall begin to apply in fiscal year 2024.
